text: Mirtha Esther Vásquez Chuquilín (born 31 March 1975) is a Peruvian lawyer and politician. She is a member of the Broad Front. In October 2021, she became president of the Council of Ministers of Peru. Vásquez has been a member of the Member of Congress since March 2020. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Peru Category:Politicians from Lima
title: Mirtha Vásquez
